data.Question: What can you tell me about Gary Cherone?
data.Rewrite: What can you tell me about Gary Cherone?
data.Answer: Gary Francis Caine Cherone is an American rock singer and songwriter, known for his work as the lead vocalist of Extreme and for his short stint for Van Halen.

Context: What can you tell me about Gary Cherone?
Gary Francis Caine Cherone is an American rock singer and songwriter, known for his work as the lead vocalist of Extreme and for his short stint for Van Halen.
data.Question: Did Gary sing well?
data.Answer: Yes, Gary Cherone is also known for his work as the lead vocalist of the Boston rock group Extreme.

data.Question: What significant fact can you tell me about Gary that you liked?
data.Rewrite: What significant fact can you tell me about Gary Cherone that you liked?
data.Answer: I like that Gary Cherone remained in contact and on good terms with Van Halen.

data.Question: What did Cherone do after Van Halen?
data.Rewrite: What did Gary Cherone do after Van Halen?
data.Answer: After his departure from Van Halen, Gary Cherone returned to Boston and put together a new project, Tribe of Judah.

data.Question: Did they release any albums during that time frame?
data.Rewrite: Did they release any albums after Gary Cherone left?
data.Answer: After Gary Cherone, Eddie Van Halen recovered from his hip surgery in November 1999, and no official statements were made by Van Halen and no music was released.

data.Question: What are some other interesting aspects of the article?
data.Rewrite: What are some other interesting aspects of the article?
data.Answer: During that era, a single taken from 1988's OU812, When It's Love, reached the Top Five, peaking at No. 5. In addition, Van Halen was nominated for two Grammy Awards.

data.Question: How did Van Halen reunite with Roth?
data.Rewrite: How did Van Halen reunite with David Lee Roth?
data.Answer: David Lee Roth called Eddie Van Halen to discuss what tracks would be included on a planned Van Halen compilation. Shortly afterwards, Roth re-entered the studio with the band.

Context: How did Van Halen reunite with David Lee Roth?
David Lee Roth called Eddie Van Halen to discuss what tracks would be included on a planned Van Halen compilation. Shortly afterwards, Roth re-entered the studio with the band.
data.Question: Did Roth re-join the band?
data.Rewrite: Did David Lee Roth re-join the band?
data.Answer: Van Halen's appearance fueled reunion speculation. But several weeks after the awards show, it was discovered that David Lee Roth was out of Van Halen again.

Context: How did Van Halen reunite with David Lee Roth?
David Lee Roth called Eddie Van Halen to discuss what tracks would be included on a planned Van Halen compilation. Shortly afterwards, Roth re-entered the studio with the band.
Did David Lee Roth re-join the band?
Van Halen's appearance fueled reunion speculation. But several weeks after the awards show, it was discovered that David Lee Roth was out of Van Halen again.
data.Question: Why was it only temporary?
data.Rewrite: Why was David Lee Roth's renion only temporary?
data.Answer: David Lee Roth released a statement in which he stated that he was an unwitting participant in a publicity stunt by manager Ray Danniels.

data.Question: Did they release any songs during the time they were reunited?
data.Rewrite: Did Van Halen release any songs during the time they were reunited?
data.Answer: Two songs from those reunion sessions were added to the band's Best Of – Volume I album and released as singles to promote it.
